title: 51kbps down for update?
body:
thats pretty low. Did a speed test - I'm getting 22mbps so it isn't my connection.

Is it contention at your end?

replies.body: I suspect there were some hiccups with certain ISPs and their connections for the patch (seems to have been a reasonably common problem).

Yeah Im having the same problem works one week then not the next the download speed slowly counts down till nothing and take days to complete. I've checked everything and its not on my end all my other games have larger patches and finish in minutes. I hate this new client

Sounds like you probably have some connection related issues on your end. There appeared to be some issues with the most recent patch, but if this is a persistent issue for you then the cause is likely different.

Just because your connection in general is fine, doesn't mean your connection to League is. Try running through some of the steps found in these articles:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues
